ProjectTitle: Towards an understanding of the role of soft tissue structural and mechanical properties in upper limb function after breast cancer treatment: the SOFT-TI-TRIAL
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/02/2023
Data: Please update your DMP when you receive ethical approval and submit as intermediate. 
Metadata: You can also mention that you use dicom and redcap metadata, if you need help designing a standard you can make an appointment with an RDM advisor via rdm@kuleuven.be. 
Sharing: Privacy may restrict sharing, but you can still deposit your data in a repository such as KU Leuven RDR and restrict access, for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr

07/02/2023
You now submitted the RDM questions from the application, at this stage of your project FWO expects a full DMP using the Flemish standard template. When downloading your DMP from DMPonline.be make sure to select: FWO DMP (Flemish standard DMP) under download settings and select phase to download.
label: intermediate DMP needed
